title: Rowena Through the Wall
description: When Rowena falls through her classroom wall and lands in an alternate world, she doesn't count on being kidnappedâ€•not once, but twice. Unwanted husbands keep piling up, but that doesn't stop her from falling for the wrong brother. Good thing she has the ability to go back through the wall. Or can she?Warning: This book is not a 'sweet' romance - it is a sexy, funny, rollicking adventure with a spunky heroine and the medieval 'men' of her dreams!
author: Melodie Campbell
